arts.ttl: “Not surprised” – Manuel Pellegrini on Declan Rice at West Ham and Arsenal wonder-goals
arts.sum: Following Arsenal’s brilliant 3-0 victory over Real Madrid in the Champions League, the chatter on Tuesday night had been just how surprised everyone was by Declan Rice’s pair of stunning free-kicks.
